author: sky.cactus
content: Has anyone given any thought to making staking anonymous (financially)?

author: sky.cactus
content: For example, depositing stake is akin to depositing into Tornado/ZCash, and withdrawing can't be linked to the deposit.  Extra bonus points if the system makes it *impossible* to prove a particular deposit was associated with a particular withdraw.

author: sky.cactus
content: I don't have a solution for how one would slash a bad actor in such a system though.

author: sky.cactus
content: Best I can imagine is that the anonymity is just a thin layer between deposits on execution layer and the ETH landing on the consensus layer.  I think this would require that the validator "claim" their deposit on the other side.  Of course, the anonymity set would be tiny since most people will deposit and immediate claim.  ðŸ˜–

author: timbeiko
content: At the very least, we could default to sending launchpad deposits through tornado cash, but it would add complexity and costs to users. If you don't make it a default, you probably still get a tiny anonymity set
